My Employability Portal - Westminster School of Media and Communications
New announcement from [redacted_name]
üì£ A chance to collaborate with the International Journalism Festival!
International Journalism Festival Challenge!
The International Journalism Festival, the biggest annual media event in Europe, takes place every April in Perugia, Italy.
There may be an opportunity for an online/digital collaboration with the Festival, with a caveat: if you would like to participate, you need to pitch your placement idea!
The brief: please peruse the Festival‚Äôs website https://www.journalismfestival.com/ and find a way to improve the Festival‚Äôs online offering; if successful, you may be asked to implement your idea via an online project. It could be redesigning the website itself; a novel way to tag the video content on offer; a new editorial approach; making short form videos out of the long form ones and create a social media strategy; using AI to create new opportunities‚Ä¶you name
